sentences.english: At this time, party boat is a sweet promise only to find the police.
sentences.chinese: 這時，方小舟才發現許嫣然是個警察。

sentences.english: He did so much only because of her smile.
sentences.chinese: 他做了這麼多的努力只冀求她的嫣然一笑。

sentences.english: "Of course, " she said, smiling; "did you think I wouldn't?"
sentences.chinese: “是啊，”她嫣然一笑。“你擔心我不來嗎？”

sentences.english: Give a pleasant smile of a woman, right cheek dimples.
sentences.chinese: 嫣然一笑，右頰有酒窩浮現。

sentences.english: Your smiling into me is my daily dose of magic.
sentences.chinese: 你嫣然的微笑是我每日享遭到的魅力。

sentences.english: May turned to her husband with a smile.
sentences.chinese: 梅嫣然一笑轉向她的丈夫。

sentences.english: Smiling, in clear days with light.
sentences.chinese: 嫣然一笑，在風輕雲淡的日子裏飄淺。

sentences.english: Sweet ribbon toward the alcoholic state.
Why does she want to kill to heed to sweetly?
She knew what he meant, of course, but just smiled, did not speak.
sentences.chinese: 格溫當然明白他的意思，但只是嫣然一笑，沒有做聲。

sentences.english: A beautiful flower, falling just split beautiful time.
sentences.chinese: 一朵嫣然的花，垂落在剛剛綻妍的時候。

sentences.english: Macao today is like a blooming golden lotus flower.
sentences.chinese: 今日的澳門好似一朵金蓮嫣然綻放。

sentences.english: He gave us a pleasant smile.

definition: to regret leaving/reluctant to part/(onom.) young leaves stir gently in the wind
(literary) (of a woman) to have a graceful demeanor/beautiful woman
a branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people/two-character surname Murong
Nichang, abbr. for the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
